name: LILYPOP (Visual+Musical Novel, Arcade)
description:
[ADVISED FOR MATURE AUDIENCE]
LilyPop is more than a visual-novel. Heard about Broadway? Where they tell dramatic stories with music? We brought that into LilyPop. To fully engage in the experience, simply let yourself go with shooting the bubbles, enjoy the music and put your heart into Lily's mind... 

[SHORT NOTICE] 

The game is in its BETA right now, download and enjoy it! We will work harder to complete the game.
